entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Oshawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:51 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 1:50 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 3.1°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 3.1°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
